title: PopCons seek to rally Tory base as they look to a post-election future
description: Liz Truss may have been ousted from Number 10 after just 49 days. But she has support from certain Conservative MPs for her ideas to live on.

title: Tories losing next week's by-election will be 'tipping point' for 'seismic' election defeat, Nadine Dorries tells LBC
description: The Tories losing next week's by-election in Wellingborough will act as a 'tipping point' before the party faces a 'seismic' electoral wipeout, Nadine Dorries has told LBC.

title: Dame Esther Rantzen hails 'undeniable proof' Brits back assisted dying after huge victory

title: Nigel Farage: Conservatives facing 'extinction event' and he's aiming to replace them
description: The Reform Party politician spoke at the Conservatives' PopCon event about what he thinks will happen after the next election and ruled out joining the Tories. Sir Jacob Rees-Mogg, meanwhile, described his party as the "Duracell bunny of political life".

title: If Jeremy Hunt made simple tweaks to stamp duty, he could fix the housing crisis
description: As the Institute for Fiscal Studies (IFS) have noted, stamp duty not only disincentivises but penalises those who have larger homes selling up to downsize while also preventing those who need to upsize doing so because it increases the amount of cash they need up front.

title: Government to review ministers’ severance payouts but rejects immediate reform
description: Cabinet Office minister Esther McVey said the principle of making “reasonable” payments “remains sound” given ministers can be removed at any time, telling MPs: “The Government doesn’t currently intend to reform severance pay for departing ministers, although I am happy to review it.”

title: Truss warns of ‘left-wing extremists’ as she seeks to galvanise ‘secret Tories’
